segments.text: I ’ Ve just taken out an insurance policy . Are you insured ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I have life insurance and my home and its contents are also insured .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took out a life insurance policy and made my wife the beneficiary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ a good idea . You are a fireman and it can be dangerous job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to make sure that my wife will be financially secure if I die .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can terminate my life insurance policy when I retire and use the money as a pension .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s one of the conditions of my police too . It covers you if you die before you retire and when you retire .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you have to take a medical before you could take out the police ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . It was one of the conditions of the insurance police . The insurance companies need to assess the risk
segments.speaker: S1
